title: Mars Orbiter Mission
subtitle: Mars Orbiter Mission
overview:
After retrieving and cleaning the HTML from the provided URL, I extracted the relevant text describing the Mars Orbiter Mission (MOM). Here's a 3-5 sentence overview paragraph summarizing the mission:

The Mars Orbiter Mission (MOM) is a NASA mission that launched on November 18, 2013. The mission is designed to study the Martian atmosphere, with a focus on understanding the loss of atmospheric gases to space. As the first NASA mission to study Mars' upper atmosphere, MOM will help scientists understand the Martian climate and how it has changed over time. With its suite of instruments, MOM will investigate the interaction between the Martian atmosphere and the solar wind, providing valuable insights into the planet's history and evolution.
